Your Projects

To Do List

A productivity application allowing you to keep track of events and things to do throughout the day. It is possible to create custom projects and insert tasks within them.

BAR Calculator

No, it has nothing to do with alcohol. This small project's purpose is aiding the receptionists of Villa Carlotta in calculating the best available rate based on date and room occupation.

Pummaroro

This is my first work with JavaScript, and oh boy can you tell. It serves as a rudimentary pomodoro timer, useful to increase productivity when studying.

Carlotta Info Page

A simple webpage using what I had learned about vanilla CSS and HTML. Truly nothing special, just an informative page for guests to check through a QR code.

Library

I know you must be in awe with my imagination for project titles right now. This library app allowing you to keep tracks of the books you are reading and have read.

Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock

Are you bored at work? Well, don't play this game: it will worsen the situation exponentially. Was meant to be a RPS project, but made it into this because I was watching Big Bang Theory at the time.
